description: Single storey side and rear wrap around extension (west elevation), side rear infil extension (east elevation), single storey front porch extension (following demolition of existing front porch), rear roof extension (involving the conversion of roofspace to habitable use) alteration to the height of one existing chimney, removal of one existing chimney, installation of new chimney, installation of solar panels and replacement windows to the side rear and front elevation
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plan: PA 001 (Rev: C; received 18/05/2015), PA 002 (Rev: C; received 18/05/2015), PA 003 (Rev: C; received 18/05/2015), PA 004 (Rev: D; received 18/05/2015), PA 101 (Rev: C; received 18/05/2015), PA 201 (received 18/05/2015), PA 202 (Rev: D; received 18/05/2015), PA 203 (Rev: D; received 18/05/2015) and PA 204 (Rev: D; received 18/05/2015).  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those as described on the plans. 	 Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g), 1.2 (f) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015). | No part of the roof of the single storey rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 as amended, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015).
